name: Spider Hero Rescue Mission
description:
Flying Spider Superhero is an ultimate Rescue and Fighting Game. What should you do if you do if your survival city had been attacked by bad force, Criminal and Gangster. Use all your fantastic power and marvelous energy to protect the people and the universe of the survival city. This time in your survival city will take place a real gangster war. Super mutant spider hero game allows you to save the mad City and there people, The People who are in great danger in survival city. Play as Flying spider superhero and defeat gangster and criminals by using your super hero powers.

Now it is time for final battle against the gangster mafia. Flying Spider hero with unique Superpower skill to fight with mad city mafia villains. Use all your fantastic power as hero city and protect the people of survival city .It is new spider game with mixture of war, rescue and fighting game with mixture of flying spider and future battle. Flying spider hero is here and it does not need any rope to fly around the survival city because he is not rope hero he is flying hero so he can fly without rope. Blend of futuristic game and survival game added with the taste spider games and spider fighting in the crime city as a flying spider superhero rescue mission. Gangster Mafia Villains have attack your vice city and declared a war of terror. Police Cops tried to stop the mad city mafia gangster at their best but failed. Now they are calling you for help and rescue as a superhero and vice city savior you answered their call for help. Now time for combat action, Take down mafia gangster criminals and put them behind the central jail. Strike hard, with aggression and counter enemy attacks and rescue the crime city people and save them to rescue location.

Also our game have variety of amazing spider hero with flying capability. Read spider is famous all among them. We also have web spider who have capability to throw web. Other spider is black spider which is lethal power to destroy the enemies and many more. These spiders’ heroes are only hope of the people of survival city and they are calling you for help to rescue. Answer the call of the injured and rescue them. They call to you because they believe in you and your mutant spider superhero powers and they know you will do anything to save and rescue them. They look up to you as their superhero. Once you help them and save the survival city so help them to win this war against the enemy terrorist force and with help of your spider hero with flying capability.
*****FEATURE*****
• Challenging Rescue Mission
• Amazing Variety Of Spider hero
• High altitude flying experience
• Addictive game play
• Flying Spider VS Mad City Mafia
• Challenging mission in action simulator games
• Fight with mafia gangster criminal
• Survival City Environment to Explore
• High Quality 3D Graphic and Realistic Sound Effect
• Amazing Spider hero Control and Sound Effect
• Real time City Simulator
• And many More
